title: Kent Haruf, Author Of Moving, Colorado-Set Novels, Dies At 71
teaser: Novelist Kent Haruf chased writing in his youth, but it wasn't until he was 40 that he'd developed his skills enough to be published. He's best known for National Book Award finalist Plainsong.
